StnryAssetWaterActvty.name: StnryAssetWaterActvty
StnryAssetWaterActvty.description: Represents information about the water activities, such as withdrawal, consumption, or discharge that are related to the stationary assets.

ActivitySourceType.description: Specifies the type of water source that's related to this water activity.

ActivityType.description: Specifies the type of water activity related to the stationary asset.

CostCenter.description: The cost center associated with this stationary asset water activity.

CostPerUnit.description: The per unit cost of this water activity.

Description.description: The information that describes the stationary asset water activity.

EndDate.description: The date from which the values of this stationary asset water activity become invalid.

EnvironmentalRiskId.description: The environmental risk associated with this water activity.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates whether the stationary asset water activity record and the associated carbon footprint record is locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this stationary asset water activity.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Quantity.description: The quantity of water related to the selected activity type.

QuantityInM3.description: The water quantity that's calculated using the cubic meter (m3) measuring unit.

QuantityUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measure for calculating the water quantity.

ServiceProviderId.description: The supplier associated with this water activity.

StartDate.description: The date from which the values of this stationary asset water activity become valid.

StnryAssetEnvrSrcId.description: The stationary asset environmental source related to this water activity.

StnryAssetWaterFtprntId.description: The water footprint associated with the stationary asset water activity.

TotalCost.description: The total cost of this water activity.

TreatmentType.description: The type of activity that's performed for the treatment and discharge of the water.

WaterDataMeasurement.description: Specifies the mechanism or technique to measure a company's water consumption, discharge, and withdrawal.

WaterFtprntReportDate.description: The date when the water footprint data of the associated stationary asset is due to be sent to a reporting body.
